tool_description: Your Source for Endless Laughter - Jokester API is your go-to source for hilarious jokes and puns.
name: Jokester
title: Jokester

api_list.name: /jokes/categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jokester.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jokester.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://jokester.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
